妜字的基本解释

妜
yuè
眉目传情的样子。
忧愤。

妜
jué
美貌。

妜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》於悦切，入薛，影。］
(1)眉目轻佻传情的样子。
(2)忧愤，妒恨。
(3)娟。
[②]［jué］
［《集韻》古穴切，入屑，見。］
美丽貌。

妜字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妜； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页256第29
【集韻】古穴切，音玦。美貌。　又一決切，音抉。眉目閒貌。　又娟悅切，音刔。義同。一曰憂妒也。

妜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
妜字的起名意思

美貌。

妜
Basic explanation of words
妜
yuè
The look of flirtatious expressions.
worried and indignant.
妜
jué
Beautiful.
妜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" Yu Yue cuts, enters Xue, shadows. ]
(1) The appearance of frivolous and flirtatious expressions.
(2) Anger, jealousy.
(3) Juan.
[②]［jué］
["Jiyun" ancient acupoint cut, into the scraps, see. ]
Beautiful appearance.
妜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妜; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 256 29
[Jiyun] Ancient acupoint cut, sound Jue. Beautiful.　One more decision, sound decision. Casual look.　 Juan Yue cut again, sound 刔. The same meaning. One said, sorrow and jealousy.
